NAME: SW_INCR
DESCR: Software increment. The register is incremented only on writes to the Software Increment Register.

NAME: LD_RETIRED
DESCR: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass - load.

NAME: ST_RETIRED
DESCR: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass - store.

NAME: PC_WRITE_RETIRED
DESCR: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, software change of the PC.

NAME: BR_RETURN_RETIRED
DESCR: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, procedure return.

NAME: UNALIGNED_LDST_RETIRED
DESCR: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, unaligned load or store.

NAME: BR_MIS_PRED
DESCR: Mispredicted or not predicted branch speculatively executed.

NAME: DP_SPEC
DESCR: Integer data processing operation speculatively executed (A72)

NAME: STORE_BUFFER_FULL
DESCR: Data Write operation that stalls the pipeline because the store buffer is full.

NAME: SNOOPED_DATA
DESCR: SCU Snooped data from another CPU for this CPU.

NAME: INDIRECT_BRANCH_MISSCOMPARE
DESCR: Indirect branch mispredicted because of address miscompare.

NAME: IL1_ERROR
DESCR: L1 Instruction Cache (data or tag) memory error.

NAME: DL1_ERROR
DESCR: L1 Data Cache (data, tag or dirty) memory error, correctable or non-correctable.

NAME: CYCLE_DPU
DESCR: Counts every cycle the DPU IQ is empty and that is not because of a recent micro-TLB miss, instruction cache miss or pre-decode error.

NAME: CYCLE_DPU_IMISS
DESCR: Counts every cycle the DPU IQ is empty and there is an instruction cache miss being processed.

NAME: CYCLE_PU_ITLB
DESCR: Counts every cycle the DPU IQ is empty and there is an instruction micro-TLB miss being processed.

NAME: CYCLE_PREDECODE
DESCR: Counts every cycle the DPU IQ is empty and there is a pre-decode error being processed.

NAME: INTERLOCK_OTHER
DESCR: Counts every cycle there is an interlock that is not because of an Advanced SIMD or Floating-point instruction, and not because of a load/store instruction waiting for data to calculate the address in the AGU. Stall cycles because of a stall in Wr, typically awaiting load data, are excluded.

NAME: INTERLOCK_ADDRESS
DESCR: Counts every cycle there is an interlock that is because of a load/store instruction waiting for data to calculate the address in the AGU. Stall cycles because of a stall in Wr, typically awaiting load data, are excluded.

NAME: INTERLOCK_SIMD
DESCR: Counts every cycle there is an interlock that is because of an Advanced SIMD or Floating-point instruction. Stall cycles because of a stall in the Wr stage, typically awaiting load data, are excluded.

NAME: STALL_LD
DESCR: Counts every cycle there is a stall in the Wr stage because of a load miss.

NAME: STALL_ST
DESCR: Counts every cycle there is a stall in the Wr stage because of a store.
